credentials.description: Credentials to use when running this step.

connection.description: A Relay Google Cloud Platform (GCP) connection to use

service-account.json.description: A base64-encoded JSON service account key to use for deploying the revision.

project.description: The identifier of the Google Cloud project to deploy to.

service.description: The name of the service to deploy to.

region.description: The Google Cloud region to deploy to.

repository.description: The name of the repository containing the Docker image.

serviceAccount.description: The service account to use when executing the service

email.description: The email address of the service account

command.description: The command to execute in the container.

args.description: A list of arguments to provide to the container

concurrency.description: The number of requests a single instance of the service can respond to simultaneously

maxInstances.description: The maximum number of instances that can be running at once

port.description: The container port to forward requests to.

env.description: A YAML key-value mapping of environment variables to provide each container.

labels.description: A YAML key-value mapping of labels to add to the revision.

allowUnauthenticated.description: Whether to allow anonymous access to the service.

revisionSuffix.description: The revision identifier to use, appended to the service name.
